scenarios.title: Browsing around the site for items

steps.step: When I want to browse through a treasury gallery
When I want to buy something from etsy.com
steps.cause:
When I want to buy something from etsy.com
cause : org.seleniumhq.selenium.fluent.FluentExecutionStopped: NoSuchElementException during invocation of: ?.a(By.linkText: Buy)

steps.step: When I want to browse the treasury
When I choose the first treasury gallery
Then results will be displayed in the gallery
